snippet.title: Five Nights at Freddy's 1 - Localization update for Mobile Released
snippet.description:
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/five-nights-at-freddys/id912536422

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fivenightsatfreddys&hl=en_US&gl=US

It's finally here, The first Freddy's pizzeria is going international. We  have updated the game to include subtitles for English, French, German, Dutch, Spanish (Latin America), Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), Korean.

It's available now, If you speak one of these non-English languages please tell your friends to visit your favorite pizzeria! We also have done a few other small fixes...

- New Foxy plushie for your desk (in-app purchase)
- New graphics for the plushies
- Minor fixes and improvements

Please follow our channel!

#MadeWithFusion #FNaF
